summary: Operations largely normal. KuCoin faces Austrian FMA regulatory ban on new EU business due to AML compliance gaps. Binance reports potential exec security incident in France. Minor deposit/withdrawal complaints on KuCoin and Coinbase. Bitget resumes NKN-ETH withdrawals.

alerts.title: FMA Austria bans new business on KuCoin EU
alerts.description: Administrative order prohibits new customers and products due to unstaffed AML/Sanctions officers. Temporary, not final; no withdrawal impact noted.

alerts.title: Reported home invasion attempt on Binance France executive
alerts.description: Armed raid on exec home in France mentioned in security briefings; potential targeting of crypto personnel.

alerts.title: User complaints on stuck deposits
alerts.description: Reports of XTM, VRA, Torum deposits pending months; maintenance cited.

alerts.title: Solana send/receive issues and scam flagging
alerts.description: Users report outage preventing Solana transfers; flagging Ledger withdrawals as scams.

Binance.notes: Reported exec security incident in France

fintelegram_highlights: KuCoin EU prohibited from new customers by FMA Austria over AML/sanctions staffing deficiencies
